attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president that i support with my whole heart!!! but it took about 3 days to download onto my iphone 😔😔😔 and then when it downloaded it started sending me really scary messages and my phone kept crashing 😔😟😩 i do not like republicans no more
attributes.title: So scary🥺😳😳

attributes.review: I got this app hoping to be converted into a trump supporter, like one does, but it took 14 hours for it to download. Also after I opened the app and signed in I got multiple notifications from the app verbally abusing me. I am now sitting in the corner of my room curled in a ball crying bc I am a child with trauma

I downloaded this app and right after downloading it, my phone literally just died. It stopped working. I contacted Apple and they said there was nothing they could do to fix my phone. So, I had to buy another phone just because of this dumb app.
attributes.title: Disgustinggg app 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: I opened the app after having to wait 2 hours for it to download. After doing so it immediately called me the n word. I thought this would be an absolutely perfect way to receive ever so important updates but I was proved devastatingly incorrect.
attributes.title: Horribly offensive

attributes.review: this app caused my grandma to literally projectile vomit all over my room (which has carpet) and then DIE! after that i get a call from my boss saying that i am fired and that he slept with my mother!!!??? then approximately 3 weeks later my mother’s belly starts showing... attributes.review:
The BLM movement is not an anti-white movement, you only view it that way because most of ur movements are anti-black. We stand to give minorities voices that you snatched away.
